text: O lyudy, os聞 prytcha shcho vy povynni obmirkovuvaty oberezhno: idoly vy zdiymayetesya bilya BOHA mozhete nikoly ne utvoryty mukhu, navit聞 yakshcho vony banded razom zrobyty tak. Furthermore, yakshcho mukha vykradaye bud聞 shcho z nykh, vony ne mozhut聞 povernuty tse; slabyy yavlyaye soboyu pursuer ta peresliduvav
